result.markdown: --- title: "" --- ## Week 7 ### Day 1 #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Please bring laptop today - Lecture (Code): Bayesian Hierarchical Model Files - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("brms","bayesplot")) ``` ::: #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Readings for next class: - Kery and Schaub Ch13 ### Day 2 (lab) #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Discuss Project - Lecture: Board Work - Downloads: Files - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("ubms")) ``` ::: #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Readings for next class: - Assigned Reading on SDM
